name: Where is my Human? (Mienfeu)
description:
A sandwich accidentally falls off of a waiter’s tray & finds itself lost in a restaurant!

A life in the wilderness… Or perhaps in some lonely trash can? Only to invariably be slowly consumed by insects?

Is this what life will reduce itself to for ‘Sammich’?!

No! Fighter Sammich refuses to give up! Help Sammich spin its way to its ‘hooman’ who ordered it so that it can be eaten & have its destiny fulfilled!

Maneuvering past other people walking in the restaurant to avoid getting squished, Sammich must stealthily proceed, seek refuge behind obstacles, & look for green haloed feet to identify its owner to finally succeed in its life mission of being eaten.

Note: Project was created for a GameJam, might have bugs which are being fixed, & could be expanded upon little-by-little with time.
